Articles.Content:
>:(The Kerbs are attempting to build a college on the Mun, there are no part restrictions, but there must be an administrative building, 3 class buildings, 2 dorms, and some kind of crazy statue. The rules are, all buildings must be no farther than 500m from another building, the original flight crew needs to be on staff to teach the new kerbs, and it must be built in a crater. I will update the list of 5 bases I deem coolest

1.)Markus Reese

2.)

3.)

4.)

5.)
May I have bonus points for doing this on Minmus instead?
May I have bonus points for doing this on the Space Kraken instead 8)

sure, like I said, it is completely subjective, I play ksp A LOT and know what goes into putting things on bodies, however, due to the lakes on Minmus, I must warn you Stevenator, that I am less impressed by 9 buildings on a lake than on a mountain
You have been warned, Stevenator. Don\'t take this lightly.

Campus in production, I pushed it a bit further though and decided I needed to set up a comms system first. Plus need to land a rover so I can survey the ground first Hopefully will be done tomorrow provided all landings go according to plan. Some interesting designs coming 8)

Guess one and only!

I wanted to fly a third lab in, but due to it running slow, choppy and laggy, lab II had to be landed some distance away. A third would be impossible. Anyways, the two dorms can be clearly seen with horizontal solar panels. The Admin was the four engines vertical sitting structure, but instead can consider the comms building; The one using lander parts. Three classrooms would be the two lab buildings with tri vertical solar panels, and what I originally landed as admin, or the comms structure. Lastly, the statue is the cool virus looking building that originally dropped my rover to scout the area. Not wild, but no way to remove anything or land anything else.
Here is my partly completed mun base, its only half completed. also is it ok if i use large rovers instead of buildings?

Here is my partly completed mun base, its only half completed. also is it ok if i use large rovers instead of buildings?

Rovers are okay, keep up the good work!
December, what is that structural beams pack you are using there? I like some of those pieces!

December, what is that structural beams pack you are using there? I like some of those pieces!

i believe they are from nova siliskos probe pack

Markus\' base is awesome. I posted on his personal thread about his base trying to find out what all mods were used other than powertech and dynasat. I want that rover mod for sure! awesome. cant wait for more to be posted. I know what i am attempting to do tonight!
i added 2 more rovers to my base. one rover i accidentally landed 40k from my base on the edge of the crater, it was a long long drive....

i added 2 more rovers to my base. one rover i accidentally landed 40k from my base on the edge of the crater, it was a long long drive....

Well, keep up the good work, you took the all kerbal road trip though 8)
